nandikadal kalapuwe di batahirayan 1833 di bauthisma kala demala jathiwadaya mulumanin ma deshapalana washayen parajaya wu bawath ee samaga indu lanka giwisuma ha dahathunwani wyawastha sanshodhanaya naithika wa ahosi wu bawa mahindage upadeshakayan, prathipaththi prakashana sakas karannan, nodannawa wenna puluwan.

onna danma kiwwa ithin melo wadakata na..)hik hikada ude nagitiddima ahune wahalata wahi bindu wawena sadde..amuthuma lathawakata....sithalath ganata ane adath niwadu una nam koyi tharam shoyida....hodata perawagena deyiyane kiyala nidaganna thibba..ane eeth ithin rassawal karanne ape than wala neweyine....oni ooni hatiyata niwadu ganna.....kammali kama ada reddath ekkama thiyala nagitala sithala wathuren muna sodala ada dawasa patangaththa.....witen wita hemin hemin hayiyen hayiyen watena wassath ekka hangimuththu kara kara karyalayata aawa kiyamuko....hayiyo....karyala pariganakaya wada na...eekata monado wela mama kammalikama paththakata dammata eyata ada wada karanna kammali hithilada koheda mona karannada kiyala ithin karanna thibba wada tika mama ma karala ahawara karala damma...wahi mandarama hinda ee wada kerenuth nikam kerena nokerena ganata....ada dawasama hitha mokakdo manda ara bonchi kiyanawa wage wachana walin wisthara kara ganna bari amuthuma hagimakin pirila thibbe....habayi dan me wenakota ee kiyanne dawasa awasana paya kihipaya wana wita ee hagima ahawarayi...mama hithanawa ahawarayi kiyala...ee arenna wena deyak ada siddha unema na....patali tayi hela tayi upandina subha pathum path araganima harenna....aa thawa deyak thiyenawa liyanna....mata ada mage pasal mithuriyak wena sisarawa mohothakata mathak karawapu kenek muna gahuna....habayi ee kena nam pirimiyek...eeth jiwitha gamane jiwath weddi mohothakata muna gasuna kenek widiyata me satahanath hamadama hidiwi.......chiwithe samahara thathpara kalpayak tharam kal mathaka hitinawane nadda man ahanne?wahi biramath ekka tika dawasakata passe podi kawi padayak oluwata aawa eekath liyalama me satahana nima karanawa....meka liyala athi wadak na....oopadupa godak witharayi liyawenne....jiwithaya gala yayi hemi heminarunalokasanda kirana..
